website_summaries.verdict: An elegant three-lamp set with one floor lamp and two matching table lamps.
pros: This three-lamp set has a nicely accented bronze finish and looks great
Assembly is straightforward and the shades are attractive
The table lamps stand 26.5 inches tall and the floor lamp is 62.5 inches tall
cons: Threads may strip when screwing lamp pieces together

customer_reviews.title: 2 Lamps, not 3. Also a headache.
customer_reviews.text: All of the reviews are true, but beware, no matter how careful you are there is a large chance *any* of the threads will strip. People are only having issues with the lamp because the weight makes stripping this thread almost impossible. I would suggest having multiple people slowly screw it down -- oh... and there *will* be a gap. Do *not* try to fix the gap unless you want to waste your time/money praying that Amazon will assist and accept the broken crap you are forced to ship back (somehow) So basically, if you are careful, two lamps for $90 -- not the greatest deal afterall. The lamps themselves are attractive enough given the materials they are built from.
customer_reviews.author: Cryph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp set
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my living room. I wish the floor lamp was a little taller but it is still working out. The assembly was intuitive and easy to do by myself. The lamps were well packaged, I was convinced it had to be missing some pieces but I was wrong. No damage to any component, small compact box for delivery. I am satisfied with the quality of craftsmanship for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Enailia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Lamps
customer_reviews.text: I agree with some of the other reviews regarding the cheap construction and shoddy paint job. The tall lamp doesn't line up straight at all. You can clearly see the threads sticking up from the bottom portion at a 10-15 degree angle. Not only does this not stand up straight but the top portion doesn't even screw down entirely. The gold painted lines, which are mentioned by another reviewer, are horrible. I can see wavy, jagged, and incomplete lines on not one but all of the lamps. I cannot recommend this product to anyone looking to buy a quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are very pretty on line and for the most part up close ...
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are very pretty on line and for the most part up close too. They came packaged very well. However, the knobs that hold the shades on were stripped when mine came in. If you barely bump the table that the table lamps are on, the knob falls off. Pretty annoying. Also the shades that came with mine seem to be off just a little. I would prefer them to put out more light, but that probably is my fault for not reading the wattage of what kind of bulb you can put into the lamps. I liked the price of them, so I guess you what they say is true. "You get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied, great company.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the lamps were sturdy, well built and packaged properly. In fact I bought another set of the same lamps and the spacer on the floor lamp was not the same which meant one floor lamp ended up 2 inches shorter than the other. I called the shipper, Normande Lighting and they sent me a replacement overnight at NO charge. They took care of me on the spot, great service !!
customer_reviews.author: Martin M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product even if it was at a higher price
customer_reviews.text: Great product even if it was at a higher price. The accent color lines could be painted on a bit straighter but it actually gives it some character. It's unnoticeable unless directly inspecting based on other reviews. Foam packaging is a bit of a pain as it breaks into tons of small pieces when unpacking creating a mess. However small issue for a well packaged product to deliver damage free.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I know $30 per lamp is a pretty good price but it's not a cheap either. These lamps are ok, the paint job is cheap in the details. I'll use them (for lack of finding anything else) but I'm disappointed in the quality for the price paid. Also the floor lamp is not screwing together properly. I'll have to send it back if my husband can't fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D W

customer_reviews.title: Quality lamps
customer_reviews.text: My wife chose as bought these but we are really happy with them. Seem nicely made and have a good solid feel to them. I have 100W equivalent LED bulbs in them and they work great. Been using them for about six months now no issues. Assembly was easy and packaging was good although annoying and kind of ghetto-wrapped, but they arrived safe so not a big deal. Real happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gregom

customer_reviews.title: Watch what you order.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are kind of iffy, I’m not sure how to rate them, first off all the finials were messed up. One was broken, we had to put tissue in the holes just to get the shades to work and to be tight. Not happy, wanted to return them but I already gave the old ones away. I guess live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Wal Mart

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought. They work great and for the price they are fantastic. What I suggest, when putting the tall lamp together start with the top and go easy so as not to strip the threads and it will stand up straight. As an aside these lamps dont come with bulbs and the suggested bulbs are not energy saving. I did some conversion on them and I am running 8 amp 500 lumnins LEDs in the smaller lamps just fine.
customer_reviews.author: KatM

customer_reviews.title: Am disappointed that this lovely lamp set did not come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Am disappointed that this lovely lamp set did not come with the parts to set up this lamp now am worried I can't find the parts to operate it wasn't mentioned that it wasn't included had I know I would have not purchased
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: ... floor lamps' construction is not as stable as I'd like it to be
customer_reviews.text: I was not thrilled with the lamp shades themselves and I felt as though the floor lamps' construction is not as stable as I'd like it to be. Regardless, they look great and provide the right lighting for the space where I utilized them! The company did a great job packaging these lamps in a package I was certain couldn't possibly contain three whole lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but very bad manufacturing!!!
customer_reviews.text: The two stars just for the good look we wished to have from the design of the lamps set. But,,, it took me long time to assemble it because of the bad manufacturing in some steps I end up fixing and tying things together to be put in the right shape. The plastic weight flooring for the floor lamp wasn’t straight until I did it. The way to turn it on and off is very old fashion!! I may think to return it before the eligibility is expire!!
customer_reviews.author: LoL

customer_reviews.title: These looked beautiful online, but when I opened the package I ...
customer_reviews.text: These looked beautiful online, but when I opened the package I was sorely mistaken. The metal work looks cheap and crude, along with the paint. Both table lamps have defects which are: one the top half was not totally inserted into the bottom half and is crooked because of this. The gold accent paint on the other is almost non-existent, so they look only halfway the same. The two stars is because they still turn on. i can't believe a product was allowed out of the factory like this.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty lamps that compliment our bedroom decor nicely
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty lamps that compliment our bedroom decor nicely. We matched the two table lamps with the Dalton bedroom set from Living Spaces and it looks really nice... sort of at the boundary between "modern" and "rustic." Didn't have a place in the bedroom for the floor lamp, so we put it in another room. A bonus lamp! Cool stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bohrdom

customer_reviews.title: Quality Lamps at a Nice Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this purchase. Lamps are good quality and fairly heavy -- no danger of them tipping over. High quality lampshades are also included. I only wish I could buy two more floor lamps without the table lamps, as I just need the floor lamps. In any event, these a quality lamps at an amazing price. And easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: London 2000

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! I sent back the next day it was embarrassing how bad the paint job was 😣
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not well made.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, but be warned the screw tops for shades do not fit well and one came stripped. I noted many other reviews with the same complaint so I was extra careful with assembly - clearly came stripped.
customer_reviews.author: Dan DeMerchant

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are better than I expected. They go perfect with my decor as there is a bit of a purple shade to them which I wasn't expecting. Easy to set up, and just the right size to add the perfect amount of light where needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Chic!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these lamps a couple of days ago and I LOVE them! The shades are a bit darker than I expected, but it still works for my living room. The floor lamp is strong and sturdy, no leaning to the side! And the pleats in the shades bring style and sophistication to them. Definitely worth the money. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, all lamps had issues, read all negative before buying
customer_reviews.text: I should have read negat9ve reviews, every lamp had issues either being bent or bolts dont fit finial. With superglue I was able to get one ok looking, other two I am probably donating. Only positive is that finish looks pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY B ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: 3 piece Lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are sturdy & so beautiful. Love them. This company packed it so well. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: SandyA

customer_reviews.title: I love them, BUT all three shades have pin holes ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them,BUT all three shades have pin holes in them at exactly the same spot. Too much trouble to return so I will live with.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty lamps. They are stylish,easy to put together. Ordered a 2nd group. Liked them that much.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Up North

customer_reviews.title: Trim Painting Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp set twice. The 1st order was perfect, no complaints. The 2nd order looked like the trim was painted by children. No quality control. Be aware, see photos, one photo of 1st set, two photos 2 of second set.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKing 2016

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shades are smaller than expected. On the floor lamp, the pole would not screw properly onto base as not quite same size. Required to wrap electrical tape around threaded area to get a tight sturdy connection.
customer_reviews.author: LyneG

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are beautiful. The detailing and the color is very prettty
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are beautiful. The detailing and the color is very prettty. Also, they are so easy to put together and they haven't failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Troncozo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamp Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is so nice. They look great in my living room. Packaging was well done. Worst part was the clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Medina

customer_reviews.title: We both love them. They are beautiful and work well
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my mother. We both love them. They are beautiful and work well. Easy to put together. Would buy them again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they look exactly like the photos
customer_reviews.text: Just got the lamps, they look exactly like the photos. The floor lamp is a little shorter than I thought it would be but still looks great. Assembling the floor lamp was a little tough, it takes a little work to get the two middle poles to sit flush. Overall, for the price i don't think you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lamp set!! High quality and the shades are very pretty with the darker trim.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni S

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews, im not the only one with this issue.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these lamps. The gold painted trim is terrible. It's like second grader meets golden shimmer sharpie. JUST delivered and it's on its way back.
customer_reviews.author: devan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. As stated by other reviewers, the detail work (painting) could have been much better. As long as visitors dont look closely at it, I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dock

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and easy to put together. Shades are a darker beige than the picture shown but with bulbs they light up room nicely.
customer_reviews.author: M. Folley

customer_reviews.title: One Defective table lamp
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, cost of these lamps however one of my table lamps screw is Stripped, so im not exactly happy.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: Great lamps for the price. Functional and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Backus

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The lamps arrived quickly. They were easy to put together. They look lovely. I am thrilled beyond belief! Just exactly what I wanted and more.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price - bought them for my son's first apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: The bronze color is not pretty and the gold trim was awful
customer_reviews.text: The bronze color is not pretty and the gold trim was awful. From a distance they look okay but up close you can see how cheap it is. Like everyone else said, the tall one isn’t tall and is crooked no matter what you do. The lamps shades are nice though. Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: jake mache

customer_reviews.title: The larger lamp didn't screw together entirely. No real ...
customer_reviews.text: The larger lamp didn't screw together entirely. No real help from Amazon and since it was my first purchase ever that was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shades don't thread onto lamps. Not even using the floor lamp, the shade won't go on.
customer_reviews.author: Faith34

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They really enhanced the area that I used them in.
customer_reviews.author: tired teacher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value ...nice quality fir the price.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nite lights and floor lamps
customer_reviews.text: Perfect nite lights and floor lamps. The shade is light beige so it goes with any decor. The lamps are sturdy but light to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend putting a little WD-40 when screwing on the pole ...
customer_reviews.text: They work well. Putting together the floor lamp, I highly recommend putting a little WD-40 when screwing on the pole area. Other than that they are great
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an excellent quality! Great set of lamp, so beautiful... Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: But other than that I think it's a nice warm glow and pretty fancy looking for something pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing I can say is that the tall lamp didn't screw on properly. I've tried it cereal times but it keeps getting crooked every time. But other than that I think it's a nice warm glow and pretty fancy looking for something pretty cheap. I love the color and the shades are nice not wrinkled or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look great in her apartment
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these as a gift for my mom. She loves them! They look great in her apartment. They are a very classy, stylish lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 3 beautiful lamps and at a good price! Shipping was prompt and everything was in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of my lamp shade came with a small tear .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the parts was not threaded as needed to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Bluebabe822

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty lamps with a nice warm glow to them. The price is reasonable, they're easy to assemble, and it's pretty impressive that they can get all three into one box. I would definitely consider getting more lamps from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several a times and I kept getting broken lamps
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Sucre

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps for the Price, Not 100% sturdy but fit the bill.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are very nice for the price. The floor lamp is lower than expected and won't work for higher ceilings. The color of the shade is a light mocha, but the light displayed at night is quite beautiful. It doesn't have that solid brass feel to it, like a nicer lamp, but serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Azhar

customer_reviews.title: The lamps themselves I really like. The only thing I have to comment on ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamps themselves I really like. The only thing I have to comment on is that the lampshade is quite wobbly as they just fit right into the little lifted circle piece on top of the lamp and they don't have anything to secure or screw them on to be sturdy. Other than that the only thing I had an awful time with was getting them out of the box. They were packaged pretty tightly into one box leaving me to cut half the box apart and the styrofoam to just get them out leaving a mess. But once I got them out and together I was pretty please otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are pretty but a bit tricky to assemble. It is very easy for pieces to fit together crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Normande lights
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as fixtures appeared to be assembled in some 3rd world country
customer_reviews.author: Vette67

customer_reviews.title: I love these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are excellent. They look beautiful. They were packaged very well. They don't look or feel flimsy or cheap. The price is great!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Looks are Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Many small defects if you look closely (on posts and shades) Item arrived with Styrofoam destroyed (what a mess to clean up thousands of little Styrofoam "balls"Also, l lamps did not secure and stand straight.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great, they match everything and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Pastore

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are broke and don't care I would not waste my money on these
customer_reviews.text: Shades are poorly made. The set looks much more cheap in person. It was bought for extra lighting but I don't want them seen. Should have sent them back but it seemed too much hassle. Unless you are broke and don't care I would not waste my money on these. Pay MORE elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Massie Moore

product_meta.title: Normande Lighting qCOM-2648A-3PK Lamp, qBronze
product_meta.description: 2 x 60W Table Lamps and 100W Floor Lamp in 3 pack matching set. Bronze Finish. Table Lamps 26.5" and Floor Lamp 62.5". Bulbs Not Included.
feature_bullets: Matching 3 Pack Set with 2 table lamps & floor lamp
